        """

labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['法國', '澳門', '愛爾蘭', '商品解釋', '醫療保健'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['法國', '澳門', '愛爾蘭', '商品解釋']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['澳大利亞', '英國', 'Singapore', '周期性消費品和服務', '產業'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['澳大利亞', '英國', 'Singapore', '產業']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['比利時', '法國', '日本', '商品解釋', '能源'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['比利時', '日本']
